---

## ğŸ’¡ Format

```
TRK-YYYYMMDD-XXXXX

TRK       = Tracking prefix
YYYYMMDD  = Date shipped (20240115 = Jan 15, 2024)
XXXXX     = Unique number (never repeats)

Examples:
TRK-20240115-10523
TRK-20240115-10524
TRK-20240116-10525
```
